reviewText: This video is ok but with the pictures I assumed it was for small children.  It is not.  Kind of crude humor.
LOVE, LOVE, LOVE this DVD! So does my son. :-)

My kids have always loved The Pond.  Christian values in a fun way kids can understand.  Now my older kids are watching them again with their little brother, helping reinforce the lesson of loving your enemies.  I think that's a lesson we all need to remember.

These dvds are well done - animation, sound, songs are quite good.  The story lines are pretty good and there is a Christian moral.  The humor in them though is definitely for older children, I would say at least eight years and older.  My children are 3 and 5 and I'm pretty sure they don't get much of what's even going on. I can see how older kids would like it though.
